script.name: OS - Apple Software Updates
script.info: Script will prompt/encourage users to update by navigating them to Sys Prefs > Software Updates. By the end of the deferral period, updates will be installed.

parameters.parameter4: Optional: Number of postponements allowed. Default: 3
parameters.parameter5: Optional: Number of seconds dialog should remain up. Default: 900 seconds
parameters.parameter6: Optional: Number of seconds dialog should remain up for Apple Silicon Macs
parameters.parameter7: Optional: Contact email, number, or department name used in messaging
parameters.parameter8: Optional: Set your own custom icon
